name: BOW DOWN TO MATH
description:
Ever wanted to improve your math skills or get into a good college? YOU NEED PRACTICE M8. This brain improving game will have you in the competitive math field in no time! Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division. WHAT CAN POSSIBLY GO WRONG?!

This game is suitable for all ages, though younger audiences may find key concepts frustrating and certain scenes uncomfortable*.

*this game is in no way NSFW. There are no swears, sexual content or excessive gore at all. Bodily harm is implied but that might just be a ketchup fountain.
